mapper.select: SELECT LIST_ID FROM PLT_LAYOUT_LIST WHERE TAB_ID = #{TAB_ID}::INTEGER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLT_LAYOUT_LIST( LIST_ID, TAB_ID ) VALUES( #{LIST_ID}:: INTEGER , #{TAB_ID}:: INTEGER);
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PLT_LAYOUT_LIST WHERE LIST_ID = #{LIST_ID}::INTEGER AND TAB_ID = #{TAB_ID}::INTEGER
